name: Easy Digital Downloads – Location Export
author: Mint Plugins

sections.description:
If you need the ability to export csv files based on date and country, most likely for tax reporting purposes, this allows you to create those files specific by country or by state.

Features of the plugin include:

  • Export CSV files based on date and location

Follow this plugin on GitHub

Languages

Easy Digital Downloads – Location Export as been translated into the following languages:

  1. English

Would you like to help translate the plugin into more languages? Join our WP-Translations Community.
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin
  2. Go to Downloads > Reports > Export
  3. Select the date, country, and state you wish to export
  4. Export the CSV
sections.changelog:
1.0.0.8: November 5, 2014

  • Add Totals Row to the bottom of the export. This way you don’t have to manually add up each row to get the totals for tax etc

1.0.0.7: November 5, 2014

  • Fixed bug if purchase didn’t have a location attached to it.

1.0.0.6: June 11, 2014

  • Add “All Months” option to allow for the export of sales-by-location from an entire year.

1.0.0.5: May 2, 2014

  • Fixed ajax bug which prevented on-the-fly country changes with state updates

1.0.0.4: April 15, 2014

  • Fixed bug if filtering just by country and NOT state.

1.0.0.3: January 6, 2014

  • Included searching by country for dates prior to EDD changes in August 2014

1.0.0.2: December 4, 2014

  • Fixed user address matching

1.0.0.1: December 4, 2014

  • Fixed double including of export form file

1.0.0: December 4, 2014

  • First release!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Activate the plugin
  2. Go to Downloads > Reports > Export
  3. Select the date, country, and state you wish to export
  4. Export the CSV

short_description: Export payment history by location and date. Useful for tax logs.
